name: Spring Sweet Pea Pasta Salad
author: kimberly
summary: This quick and easy salad can be served as a side dish or a main course. I suggest serving it with sliced apple, sweet gherkins, or cornichons. Nice bread and a glass of white wine wouldn't hurt either!
ingredients: 1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste
8 ounces diced fully cooked lean ham
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil over high heat
Add the bow tie pasta, and cook until al dente, 8 to 10 minutes
Drain and rinse well with cold water, then toss with the olive oil, and set aside
Stir the sour cream, mayonnaise, lemon juice, lemon zest, dried dill, cayenne pepper, and salt until smooth
Fold in the onion, peas, ham, Cheddar cheese, and bow tie pasta
Garnish with the dill sprigs to serve
